  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_402</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Tasa de variación media</string>
            <string language="en">Average rate of change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durchschnittliche Änderungsgeschwindigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cadence de changement moyenne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Taxa de mudança média</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tasso di cambiamento medio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσο ποσοστό αλλαγής</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de tasa de variación media de una función en un intervalo. Se relaciona este concepto con el de velocidad media de un móvil.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of mean rate of variation of a function in an interval, with its relation to the speed of a moving object.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">velocidad media</string>
            <string language="en">average speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">velocidad</string>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">intervalo</string>
            <string language="en">interval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">móvil</string>
            <string language="en">moving object</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tasa de variación media</string>
            <string language="en">mean rate of variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept des Mittelkurses der Variante einer Funktion
in einem Abstand, mit seiner Relation der Geschwindigkeit einer 
beweglichen Nachricht zu erklären.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de la cadence moyenne de la 
variation d'une fonction dans un intervalle, avec sa relation à la 
vitesse d'un objet mobile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito da taxa média da variação de uma função em um 
intervalo, com sua relação à velocidade de um objeto movente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto del tasso medio di variazione di una funzione in 
un intervallo, con il relativo rapporto alla velocità di un oggetto 
commovente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια του μέσου ποσοστού παραλλαγής μιας 
λειτουργίας σε ένα διάστημα, με τη σχέση της με την ταχύτητα 
ενός κινούμενου αντικειμένου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">durchschnittliche Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vitesse moyenne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
